text: Creating Projects based on Business Analytics

title: Moiz Deshmukh
text:
Moiz Deshmukh


MS in Business Analytics | Boston University


3 years of professional experience in Data Analytics, Digital Marketing, and Business Operations across India, the UAE, and the USA.







 CONTACT ME

title: About
text:
Currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Business Analytics at Boston University, USA, I am deeply engaged in understanding data-driven decision-making.
I have worked at leading marketing agencies in India and Dubai (UAE), enhancing brand performance across diverse industries such as medical, hospitality, real-estate and financial exchange.
​ As the founder of BizMode Tech, a digital marketing company operating globally, I lead a team that excels in crafting innovative solutions tailored to ensure our clients achieve remarkable success worldwide. My expertise in analytics equips us to adeptly navigate complex business challenges, while my unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation ensures that we consistently exceed expectations in every campaign and project.
